input.sentences: today is my birthday and i am taking a selfie with my dog .
my son decide not to join me | he is thinking something . was it your birthday gift to mom ?
thank you mom for the nice dinner on my birthday . it was a surprise to me that you collaborated with my son to cook something for me .
hey dad | what do you have for me for present ?
still waiting for you dad | dont act like your sleeping and trying to ignore me . can i take a look on your wallet ?
output.sentences: She loves taking selfies of her and the dog.
The son is thinking mom is silly for taking his picture.
The son gave his mom a nice surprise.
Hey dad, you look like you could use something to drink.
The waitress is waiting on the sleeping man's wallet.
